content.text: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer with a Web Development Diploma from Lighthouse Labs.

about_bio.text: In addition to the Web Development Diploma, I also have a Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering from UBC, a commercial pilot license,  and five years of work experience in the aviation industry. I speak Mandarin and English fluently, and I'm currently learning to speak Japanese!

project_preview_description.text: A single page application that connects seniors with volunteers who want to help improve their quality of life.
This portfolio was built with Gatsby based on the prist starter
A guitar tuner app built with React and Web Audio API

siteMetadata.title: Jerry Chuang's Portfolio
siteMetadata.description: A portfolio powered by Gatsby and Prismic to showcase portfolios and blogs.
